synthesis_conditions.equipment: 23 mL Teflon-lined pressure vessels, Fisher Isotemp programmable ovens
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: sonicated in mother liquor, washed with deionized water
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried in air, further dried by heating at 240 °C for 2 h
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: The product mixture also contains 1,3-bdcH2 and a copper-containing ligand oxidation byproduct, C32H24Cu6O26.
